<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guarded Movement](/Feats.aspx?ID=5994) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178) (Level 6)

</column>

---

Your guard is up, even while moving. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by your movement.
name: Guarded Movement
